steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fn2a3","text":"Mix GFP-tagged TBK1 with   of equilibrated GFP-Trap agarose beads (Chromotek) at a final  concentration of  . Make sure to wash beads 2x in dH2O before washing with bead assay buffer to equilibrate the beads  adding the protein to the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"C3430A7014DE11EEAE4F2FF1E6460BC2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"C694314014DE11EEAE4F2FF1E6460BC2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ecnsr","text":"To this end, wash   of beads twice with dH2O and equilibrate with bead assay buffer. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ehd3","text":"Wash the beads three times to remove unbound proteins, remove any supernatant from the beads and resuspend the beads in   of 1x Protein Loading dye, and heat-inactivate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":172,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":178,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"3784212014E011EEAE4F2FF1E6460BC2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3ABCDDF014E011EEAE4F2FF1E6460BC2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3FAEBC7014E011EEAE4F2FF1E6460BC2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
